attributes.action: at once, without delay, use any powers at his disposal to force the resignation or sacking (we're not fussy), of Welsh rugby coach Gareth Jenkins (before the Italy game would be nice).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gareth Jenkins, the current Welsh rugby coach, is unfortunatly way out of his depth coaching an international rugby team. He's probably a very nice guy but when it comes to rugby tactics and picking the best possible team at his disposal he always seems to fail miserably.

We are asking the Prime Minister to use whatever actions he deems fit to remove Mr. Jenkins from his current position (if he could possibly ensure a role as coach to the English rugby team this would be a bonus) so as to ensure the survival of Welsh rugby for many years to come.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
